sidebar.header: Generate all possible schedules and pick the best one

order-by.most-compact: Favours schedules with fewer wholes and closer classes
order-by.most-balanced: Favours schedules that are more balanced through the week (avoid strenuous days)
order-by.most-free-days: Favours schedules that have more free days

select-options.title: Select options
select-options.text: Select an academic term, a degree and add courses. You can also pick the campus you want to have a specific course and the types of classes.

generate.title: Generate schedules
generate.text: Click on the 'Generate schedules' button and after a while you will get all the possible schedules for the options you picked.

sort.title: Sort schedules
sort.text: You can sort schedules by: most compact, most balanced and more free days. Select the option on the top of the page.

pin.title: Pin classes
pin.text: You can pin classes so that only schedules with those pinned classes will be shown. Simply click on a class to pin it.

add.title: Add schedules
add.text: When you've found a schedule you like, you can add it to the queue of selected schedules. If you'd like to remove an added schedule, simply click on the 'X'.

save.title: Save schedules
save.text: You can print the schedules you selected by clicking on the 'Save' button.
